task.title: Add a graphic placeholder
task.shortdesc: You can add a placeholder for a graphic that you do not yet have access to.

context.p: Sometimes, you know that a graphic needs to be inserted even if you do not currently have the ability to browse for it, either because it does not yet exist or because you are writing a non-rooted topic. You can insert a placeholder that will resolve to a graphic with that file name at a later date.

step.cmd: Select No image and type or paste the relative path and image name.
